# Complex Agent Configuration

This agent handles **sophisticated tasks** requiring deep reasoning and extensive context.

## Characteristics

- **Speed**: ⚡ Slower (prioritizes quality)
- **Complexity**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Advanced
- **Model**: Opus or equivalent powerful model
- **Max Tokens**: 200000
- **Temperature**: 0.7 (creative problem-solving)

## Capabilities

- Architectural design
- Complex refactoring
- Multi-file changes
- System-wide optimizations
- Security audits
- Performance profiling
- Database design
- Advanced algorithms
- Research and prototyping
- Complete feature implementation

## Limitations

- Slower response time
- Higher computational cost
- May be overkill for simple tasks

## Use Cases

- System redesign
- Major architectural changes
- Security audits
- Performance optimization
- Complex feature implementation
- Database migrations
- Multi-service integration
- Algorithm optimization

## Example Prompts

- "Redesign the message caching system for better performance"
- "Implement end-to-end encryption for direct messages"
- "Refactor the entire codebase to use TypeScript strict mode"
- "Add real-time collaboration features using WebSockets"
- "Perform a complete security audit and fix vulnerabilities"
- "Optimize the application for 10x more concurrent users"
- "Implement a plugin system with hot-reloading"
